name: RadioPrague
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A news bulletin from the Czech Republic to keep you up-to-date with current events in or relating to the country. Updated daily. Newscast runs for 3 minutes. 

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your briefing.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Radio Prague to the top of your flash news briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
